name: Appartementhäuser Schwendau
description:
In Schwendau, 3 km away from Mayrhofen 
Whether in the sauna, a comfortable evening with flickering fire, to grill in the garden, breakfast on the terrace with marvellous panorama look at the imposing mountain world. 
For a vacation with the family, or with friends. It is the ideal place for a perfect time out!

makesOffer.name: Holiday home, shower, toilet
makesOffer.description:
All houses has:
a fire place
a heating
a komplete equiped kichen 
with a dish washer, a microwave, a oven, a cooking place, a coffee machine and so on...
a TV, a radio, CD-player
a store room
a skiing room
a internet connection
one double room 
one toilet
four double rooms
two seperate showers and a seperate toilet
a lawn for sunbathing
garden furnitur
car parks in front of the house
sauna
baby beds aviable
only small dogs are allowed
max. ten persons incl. baby bed
advice: non-smoker
